20110127140212.000|20110127140217.000|TR0|terror blast at Domodedovo
20110127140217.000|20110127140222.000|TR0|airport. An estimated three
20110127140222.000|20110127140227.000|TR0|thousand people were there - and

20110127140232.000|20110127140235.333|TR0|them. We can now talk to him
20110127140235.333|20110127140238.667|TR0|live...

20110127140242.000|20110127140247.000|TR0|Well, as the hunt for those
20110127140247.000|20110127140252.000|TR0|responsible continues, American
20110127140252.000|20110127140257.000|TR0|defense analyst Ivan Eland says
20110127140257.000|20110127140302.000|TR0|Al-Qaeda or other groups linked
20110127140302.000|20110127140307.000|TR0|to it might have their reasons

20110127140337.000|20110127140342.000|TR0|Following the attack at
20110127140342.000|20110127140347.000|TR0|Domodedovo, NATO and Russia have
20110127140347.000|20110127140352.000|TR0|vowed to work closely together
20110127140352.000|20110127140355.333|TR0|in the fight against global
20110127140355.333|20110127140358.667|TR0|terror as a matter of priority.
20110127140358.667|20110127140402.000|TR0|

20110127140407.000|20110127140412.000|TR0|chairman told RT that victory
20110127140412.000|20110127140417.000|TR0|over terrorism is possible only
20110127140417.000|20110127140422.000|TR0|if there's unity among the
20110127140422.000|20110127140425.333|TR0|international community.

20110127140437.000|20110127140442.000|TR0|a stumbling block in Russia-NATO
20110127140442.000|20110127140447.000|TR0|relations. At their meeting in
20110127140447.000|20110127140452.000|TR0|Brussels, Russian military
20110127140452.000|20110127140457.000|TR0|officials called on the Alliance
20110127140457.000|20110127140502.000|TR0|to give clear answers over
20110127140502.000|20110127140505.333|TR0|Moscow's role in the European
20110127140505.333|20110127140508.667|TR0|missile shield. Russia's Chief
20110127140508.667|20110127140512.000|TR0|of the General Staff Nikolai
20110127140512.000|20110127140517.000|TR0|Makarov says that NATO partners
20110127140517.000|20110127140522.000|TR0|are still reluctant to listen to
20110127140522.000|20110127140527.000|TR0|Moscow's proposals.
20110127140527.000|20110127140532.000|TR0|
20110127140532.000|20110127140535.333|TR0|Building missile defense systems
20110127140535.333|20110127140538.667|TR0|in Europe is complicated,
20110127140538.667|20110127140542.000|TR0|because it affects the global
20110127140542.000|20110127140547.000|TR0|stability reached through the
20110127140547.000|20110127140552.000|TR0|New START-treaty. The Russian
20110127140552.000|20110127140557.000|TR0|proposals have, unfortunately,
20110127140557.000|20110127140602.000|TR0|not been met with full
20110127140602.000|20110127140607.000|TR0|understanding. First, NATO
20110127140607.000|20110127140612.000|TR0|suggests building the systems
20110127140612.000|20110127140615.333|TR0|stage by stage. Though logical,
20110127140615.333|20110127140618.667|TR0|its unacceptable for us. We
20110127140618.667|20110127140622.000|TR0|must understand what Russias
20110127140622.000|20110127140627.000|TR0|final role in building missile
20110127140627.000|20110127140632.000|TR0|defense systems is. NATO and the
20110127140632.000|20110127140637.000|TR0|US said we should stop to
20110127140637.000|20110127140642.000|TR0|analyze all the threats and
20110127140642.000|20110127140647.000|TR0|challenges and to understand how
20110127140647.000|20110127140652.000|TR0|well cooperate. This gives us
20110127140652.000|20110127140655.333|TR0|confidence that well be
20110127140655.333|20110127140658.667|TR0|building those missile defense
20110127140658.667|20110127140702.000|TR0|systems together. If  not,
